channel.title: SwiftBar Releases
channel.description: Most recent SwiftBar releases (not test builds).

item.title: SwiftBar 1.4.1
item.description:
New: Update menu on open

New: Support for **bold** and *italic* text in menu title

New: Plugins list in Preferences live update with Plugin Folder changes

New: New URL scheme endpoints to `enable`, `disable` and `toggle` plugins

New: Improved multi-screen support

New: App icon

Fixed: Right click on menu bar item should always show menu

Fixed: `SFImage` honors `width` and `height` parameters

Fixed: `trim` parameter not working in some cases

Fixed: Menu bar item may move on click when using SF Symbols

Fixed: Streaming plugins are not started after sleep
